name: Martian & Machine
description:
Martian & Machine creates the next generation of digital products and services that people need and use. We focus on viable, practical strategies that are going to be executed, usability driven design that challenges the idea and new technologies and touchpoints that can be tested out fast and iterative.
We're strongest at: - Product Strategy - UI/UX Design - Web Development - Mobile Development - Chatbots - IoT - Prototyping Exporation: - Create opportunities for new digital products and business models - Challenge your current digital products and services - Discover how to improve internal processes Execution: - Build and design new digital products based on viable business models - Improve and relaunch your current digital products and services - Digitalize and optimize your internal processes
READ MORE...
